H0.text: Aging is associated with telomere shortening.

H1.text: Sleeping is associated with telomere shortening.

H2.text: Reducing is associated with telomere shortening.

H3.text: Changing is associated with telomere shortening.

A4.text: Telomere shortening is associated with aging, mortality, and aging-related diseases in experimental animals.

A5.text: Critically short telomeres trigger a DNA damage response and cellular senescence.
